meanings.definition: The transformation of one type of tissue into another.
meanings.sent1: The metaplasias of the skin cells into bone cells was a fascinating process.
meanings.sent2: Doctors observed the metaplasias of muscle tissue into fat tissue during the study.
meanings.sent3: The metaplasias of the plant leaves into petals created a unique and beautiful flower.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination went through metaplasias, transforming ordinary ideas into extraordinary creations.
meanings.sent5: The metaplasias of the caterpillar into a butterfly was a magical transformation to witness.

meanings.definition: The abnormal transformation of cells into a different type of cell.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the metaplasias of cancer cells into healthy cells.
meanings.sent2: The metaplasias of skin cells into bone cells indicated a serious health issue.
meanings.sent3: The metaplasias of the robot into a toaster was a hilarious malfunction.
meanings.sent4: The metaplasias of the storm clouds into a dragon in her dream was both terrifying and awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The metaplasias of the virus into a superhero in the comic book was a creative twist.
